title: I bought the loading border and icon yet don't have the border
body: I have the new yas skin and used chaos tokens for icon and border, yet it doesn't show up.

replies.body: Hmm, yeah I do see you have both the icon and the skin so it's weird that the border isn't showing up for you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look and see what the issue is.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
Nevermind, it's just not really noticeable. Not worth in my opinion, is there anyway I can refund and get two orbs?
